comment: A man in a green tank top wearing a rabbits foot around his neck sits on a small sofa with the window open revealing a man in a white shirt on the other side of the window .
A woman in an orange dress opens a numbered briefcase , revealing an image of a hammer .
A dog with fangs revealed is about to bite a ball with paw prints on it .
A little cute girl in a white dress is revealing her presents .
A woman taking off a large cloak revealing a extravagant dress
a woman wearing a black tank top revealing a large fairy tattoo .
A woman in a white baseball hat reveals her tan line to her friend , who wears a sunhat
The men wear ear protection as one of them lifts up the outer shell of the race car to reveal the engine inside .
A woman is propping her leg up revealing cleavage , a great tatoo , and some kicking boots .
A woman , wearing a blue dress that reveals her abdomen , is holding a sledgehammer in the forest .
A woman in a revealing plaid miniskirt and small blouse is smiling while walking down a street .
A blond woman in heels and a semi revealing dress stands on a sidewalk , distracted by something .
A woman in revealing clothes who wears a black hat and sunglasses walks down a busy street .
A group of young boys have their shirts tied up revealing their midriffs as a man in a blue shirt stands their looking uncomfortable and a woman next to him laughs .
A woman in jeans and a revealing top is jumping in front of a green hoop-like structure .
A red-haired lady reveals jarred food from underneath a blanket .

A man with a grayish blue shirt , red and blue vest , black pants , sunglasses , and earphones is standing beside a red helicopter , while the door is open revealing the inside of the helicopter , with it 's pilot and other earphones hanging in the background .
A woman in a very revealing red corset and black jacket is on stage with a microphone in her hand .
A blond female dressed in a revealing outfit is throwing white shirts into the crowd with her brunette coworker several feet behind her .
A fashion model is posing for the camera wearing a revealing top .
